Literature.Title: Salinipeptins: Integrated Genomic and Chemical Approaches Reveal Unusual d-Amino Acid-Containing Ribosomally Synthesized and Post-Translationally Modified Peptides (RiPPs) from a Great Salt Lake Streptomyces sp.
Literature.Author: Shang Z, Winter JM, Kauffman CA, Yang I, Fenical W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus pyogenes M1T1(LC50=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(LC50=>100µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(LC50=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(LC50=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(LC50=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli(LC50=>100µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(LC50=>100µg/ml),Human glioblastoma U87-MG(LC50=15µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(LC50=15µg/ml),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-231(no activity data)
